mapper.select: SELECT id,pid,name,type,code,uri,path,icon FROM sys_resource WHERE deleted=0 AND status=0 AND id IN (SELECT DISTINCT r.resource_id FROM sys_role_resource r WHERE r.role_id IN (SELECT s.role_id FROM sys_user_role s JOIN sys_user u ON s.user_id=u.id WHERE u.id=#{userId})) ORDER BY sort,id ASC
SELECT id FROM sys_resource WHERE deleted=0 AND FIND_IN_SET(id,queryResourceChildrenIds(#{id}))
